snippet: Utility crews struggled to catch up with a backlog of millions of people without electricity for a fourth day, as frustration grew and the authorities feared that the toll of 24 deaths could rise.
lead_paragraph: Utility crews struggled to catch up with a backlog of millions of people without electricity for a fourth day, as frustration grew and the authorities feared that the toll of 24 deaths could rise.

headline.main: Progress and Frustration in Battle to Restore Power
headline.print_headline: Progress And Frustration In Battle To Restore Power
